scene.description: Moomin Valley on a bright spring morning. Trees in bloom. Clouds drifting. Characters on the porch.

sentences.japanese: 心配 だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moominmamma stands on the porch on a bright spring morning, trees in bloom. She looks worried. I am worried! Clouds drift across the blue sky. The valley stretches before her. Mama worried on the porch. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright spring morning light, maternal worry mood.

sentences.japanese: ママ が 心配 している。
sentences.imagePrompt: Mama watches as the group prepares to leave. Mama is worrying! She fidgets with her apron. Cherry blossoms drift past in the breeze. Mama watching preparations. Medium shot, eye-level. Soft spring light, anxious watching mood.

sentences.japanese: 心配 する の は やめて。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll takes Mama's hand reassuringly. Stop worrying! His smile is bright. Spring flowers nod in the warm breeze around them. Moomintroll reassuring Mama. Medium close-up, eye-level. Warm spring light, reassurance mood.

sentences.japanese: 旅 に 出る。
sentences.imagePrompt: Papa announces the spring journey. Going on a trip! He stands tall on the porch steps, pointing toward the mountains. Backpacks are ready. Papa announcing the trip. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright adventurous spring light, departure announcement mood.

sentences.japanese: 旅 は いい こと だ ね。
sentences.imagePrompt: Snufkin nods happily — travel is what he lives for. Traveling is a good thing! His backpack is already on his shoulders. The open road calls. Snufkin ready for travel. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm golden spring light, travel wisdom mood.

sentences.japanese: この 旅 は 楽しい。
sentences.imagePrompt: The group walks down the blooming valley path together. This trip is fun! Butterflies dance around them. The river sparkles below. Everyone smiles. Group walking through spring valley. Medium-wide shot, eye-level. Bright cheerful spring light, joyful journey mood.

sentences.japanese: ここ で とまる。
sentences.imagePrompt: The group reaches a beautiful clearing by the river. We stop here! The spot is perfect — flat ground, shade from trees, water nearby. Group at a clearing. Medium shot, eye-level. Dappled spring sunlight, rest stop mood.

sentences.japanese: とまった！
sentences.imagePrompt: Everyone drops their packs gratefully. Stopped! Sniff immediately lies down on the soft grass. Birds sing in the blooming trees above. Group resting in the clearing. Medium shot, eye-level. Peaceful spring light, grateful rest mood.

sentences.japanese: とまる の が いい。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll stretches out on the grass, looking up at the spring sky with a contented smile. Stopping is good! White clouds drift overhead. The journey can wait a little. Moomintroll relaxing on grass. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright blue spring sky, relaxation mood.

sentences.japanese: 許して。
sentences.imagePrompt: Sniff apologizes for eating more than his share of the packed lunch. Forgive me! Crumbs on his chin. He holds up the empty lunchbox sheepishly. Sniff apologizing with empty lunchbox. Medium close-up, eye-level. Warm guilty spring light, apology mood.

sentences.japanese: 許す こと に した。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll sighs and decides to forgive Sniff. I decided to forgive him! Sniff beams with relief. Mama has extra food anyway. Moomintroll forgiving Sniff. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm forgiving spring light, gracious acceptance mood.

sentences.japanese: もう 許した。
sentences.imagePrompt: Everyone has moved on from the lunch incident. Already forgiven! The group laughs about it now. Sniff joins in, relieved. Group laughing together. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright easy spring light, all-forgiven mood.

sentences.japanese: スニフ が 逃げた！
sentences.imagePrompt: A bee approaches and Sniff bolts away in panic. Sniff ran away! He dashes across the clearing, arms flailing. Everyone watches in amusement. Sniff running from a bee. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright comic spring light, comedic flight mood.

sentences.japanese: 逃げる の は はやい。
sentences.imagePrompt: Sniff is surprisingly fast when scared. Running away is fast! He is already on the other side of the clearing. His speed impresses everyone. Sniff far away already. Medium-wide shot, eye-level. Bright amused spring light, impressed by speed mood.

sentences.japanese: 逃げない で！
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll calls after Sniff. Do not run away! The bee is already gone. Sniff stands by a tree, facing Moomintroll with a nervous expression. It is safe now. Moomintroll calling to Sniff. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm reassuring spring light, calling back mood.

sentences.japanese: 退屈 だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: After lunch, nothing happens for a while. I am bored! Little My kicks at pebbles. The afternoon stretches languidly. Even the butterflies seem slow. My looking bored. Medium shot, eye-level. Lazy warm spring light, afternoon boredom mood.

sentences.japanese: 退屈 な 時間 だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: Everyone sits around with nothing to do. A boring time! Sniff yawns. Snufkin strums his harmonica absently. The river burbles. Group sitting listlessly. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm sluggish spring light, idle time mood.

sentences.japanese: もう 退屈 じゃない。
sentences.imagePrompt: Snufkin stands up with an idea. We can get rid of boredom! He points to the river — they can go swimming. Energy returns to the group. Snufkin proposing an idea. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright energized spring light, idea spark mood.

sentences.japanese: これ を つかう。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll picks up a long stick. I will use this! He begins drawing a map in the soft dirt. A plan for the afternoon takes shape. Moomintroll with a stick. Medium close-up, eye-level. Warm creative spring light, resourceful mood.

sentences.japanese: つかった こと が ある。
sentences.imagePrompt: Papa examines the stick Moomintroll found. I have used one before! He remembers a similar adventure from his youth. Nostalgia crosses his face. Papa examining the stick. Medium close-up, eye-level. Warm nostalgic spring light, memory mood.

sentences.japanese: みんな で つかう。
sentences.imagePrompt: The group uses the stick as a fishing pole by the river. Everyone uses it! They take turns. Laughter fills the clearing as each tries their luck. Group fishing with a stick. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright playful spring light, shared activity mood.

sentences.japanese: そうそう、あの こと だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: Snufkin suddenly remembers something. Yes yes, that thing! He snaps his fingers. He had meant to tell everyone about a discovery downstream. Snufkin remembering. Medium close-up, eye-level. Bright spark spring light, sudden recall mood.

sentences.japanese: そうそう！
sentences.imagePrompt: Little My agrees excitedly. Yes yes! She had seen it too — something interesting further along the river. Both point downstream. My agreeing excitedly. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright excited spring light, shared discovery mood.

sentences.japanese: そうそう、それ が いい。
sentences.imagePrompt: Papa nods in agreement about the new plan. Yes yes, that is good! The group decides to explore downstream. Adventure calls once more. Papa agreeing about the plan. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm approving spring light, group consensus mood.
